Articles.Content: How freely can I use multithreading ? I used it and it works, but is it advisable ?

As long as you don't try to access any KSP/Unity objects/functions from any thread other than the main one you should be fine. If you do, then you might still be fine, but all bets are off (i.e. expect random, impossible to diagnose, crashes at any time)...
